# Iallanis
## Overview
Name: Iallanis

Gender: f

Rank: Lesser Deity

Areas of Concern/Portfolio: Good Giants, Love, Mercy, Beauty

Titles:

Holy Symbol: Garland of flowers

Alignment: NG

Origin of Worship: Giant

Core Worshippers: Good Giants

Common Worshippers:

Uncommon Worshippers:

Favored Weapon(s): Unarmed strike

Other Preferred Weapons:

Weapon of the Deity Spell: +1 improved unarmed strike, defending

Domains: Community\* (CD), Good, Healing, Strength, Sun.

Special Notes:
